title: Socket-Outlets
fullText:
Socket-outlets shall not be installed within 0.3 m of any floor or any other horizontal surface in any location where the floor or surface is likely to become wet.
Socket-outlets shall not be installed in Zone 0.
Socket-outlets not necessary for the connection of pool equipment shall not be installed in Zone 1.
Socket-outlets installed in Zone 1 shall be:
(i) Provided with the required degree of protection.
(ii) Located:
(A) At least 0.3 m above the floor or any other horizontal surface.
(B) At least 1.25 m from the internal rim of the water container.
